sourcesContent: import{jsxs as t,Fragment as i,jsx as e}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{authenticatorTextUtil as n}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{useAuthenticator as r}from"@aws-amplify/ui-react-core";import{Button as o}from"../../../primitives/Button/Button.js";import{Flex as s}from"../../../primitives/Flex/Flex.js";const{getSubmitText:a,getSubmittingText:c}=n,m=n=>{const{cancelButtonSendType:m,cancelButtonText:l,submitButtonText:u}=n,{isPending:p,resendCode:d,skipVerification:b,toSignIn:f}=r((t=>[t.isPending])),g=p?t(i,{children:[c(),"…"]}):e(i,{children:a()}),h=u||g;return t(s,Object.assign({direction:"column"},{children:[e(o,Object.assign({fontWeight:"normal",variation:"primary",isDisabled:p,type:"submit"},{children:h})),e(o,Object.assign({onClick:()=>{switch(m){case"SKIP":b();break;case"RESEND":d();break;case"SIGN_IN":f();break;default:return}},type:"button",variation:"link",fontWeight:"normal",size:"small"},{children:l}))]}))};export{m as TwoButtonSubmitFooter};
